code: import appConfig from'./appConfig.json';var logout=function logout(){if(sessionStorage.session){var xhr=new XMLHttpRequest();xhr.open('POST',appConfig.origin+"backend_api/logout");xhr.onreadystatechange=function(){if(xhr.readyState===4&&xhr.status===200){console.log("successfully Logged Out");delete sessionStorage.session;delete sessionStorage.login_data;}};xhr.setRequestHeader('session',sessionStorage.session);xhr.setRequestHeader('user_id',JSON.parse(sessionStorage.login_data).user_id);xhr.send();}};export{logout};
